subtitles:
185678 188369 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.

188419 191500 If you wanna get
'em out of here.

192370 195020 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!

209244 211725 Security, we have a break-in.
Get the...

220207 223028 I know who you are. I
know what you think...
223118 224495 If you don't wanna get hurt,

224520 227073 keep your mouth shut and
don't move a fucking muscle.

229175 232314 They're-They're highly contagious.
They've been given an inhibitor.

233392 235885 In order to cure, you
must first understand.

244433 247604 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249735 254036 Listen, you sick bastard, we're going and
we're taking your torture victims with us.
254126 255696 We're gonna get you out of here.

255776 260478 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277832 279963 Get it off! Get it off!

283574 286784 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295447 298658 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004322 1007192 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015365 1017935 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046793 1049013 - Please, tell me what the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078821 1083562 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085733 1090954 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."

1091044 1095085 He says "No, it's not a lion.
It's a giraffe".

1105698 1108609 You two should get on
like a house on fire.

1115391 1118922 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123483 1129924 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1130004 1133745 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159222 1165484 It started as rioting, and right from the
beginning you knew this was different.

1165674 1169845 Because it was happening in
small villages, market towns.

1170715 1173456 And then it wasn't
on the TV any more.

1173536 1178277 It was in the street outside. It
was coming through your windows.

1182148 1184979 You didn't need a doctor
to tell you that.

1191591 1196542 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.

1207765 1210506 The day before the TV and
radio stopped broadcasting,

1210596 1214247 there were reports of infection
in Paris and New York.

1216637 1219548 We didn't hear anything
more after that.

1222509 1224455 What about the government,
what are they doing?

1228120 1232161 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232291 1236552 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1238033 1241124 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241734 1245905 You're the first uninfected
person we've seen in six days.

1264300 1268301 Look, I have to find them. They live
in Deptford. I can walk it. Okay?
1268391 1270961 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285745 1290176 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292657 1296748 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300919 1304530 We'll all go and find your
dead parents together, okay?

1319184 1322365 If you want her to slow
down, you'll have to say.

1486758 1490709 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1497150 1501672 parents and my sisters, we
went to Paddington Station,

1504282 1509624 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.

1510284 1512624 I remember my dad
had all this cash,

1517586 1520717 About 20,000 other people
had the same idea.

1526288 1528589 I lost my grip on
my sister's hand.
1530769 1533110 I remember the ground was soft.

1535070 1539461 I looked down and I was
standing on all these people.

1539551 1543502 Like a carpet. People
who had fallen and...

1543592 1547554 Somewhere in the crowd there were infected.
It spread fast.

1547634 1550984 No one could run. All
you could do was climb.

1552595 1555686 Climb over more people. So I did that.
I climbed.

1555776 1558116 And I got up on top
of this kiosk.

1560427 1565378 Looking down, you couldn't tell which
faces were infected and which weren't.

1565468 1569339 Then I saw my dad. Not
my mum or my sister.

1583473 1588604 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591305 1594126 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.

1594216 1597567 No, we'll all sleep in the same room.
It's safer.

1700243 1702544 Give me a drink
of that, will ya?

1746956 1749906 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?

1749996 1752217 And his daughter.
From four doors down.

1755478 1758389 Did any of the blood
get in your mouth?
1796268 1798359 Do you have any clothes here?

1801440 1805101 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1805181 1808842 More infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837629 1840630 How did you know? How
did you know he was infected?

1841615 1844755 Yeah, but there was blood everywhere,
It was on me, it was on you.

1844811 1850112 I didn't know he was infected, okay?
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1850192 1852231 Look, if someone gets
infected, you've got

1852256 1854608 between ten and twenty
seconds to kill them.

1854674 1859805 It might be your brother, or your sister or
your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859895 1865326 Just so you know where you stand, if it
happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865416 1869638 He was full of plans. Have
you got any plans, Jim?

1869718 1874159 Do you want us to find a cure and save
the world or just fall in love and fuck?

1876859 1879420 Staying alive's as
good as it gets.

1938175 1941266 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys, huh?

1941346 1944437 Stop talking. It's
a long way up.

1954180 1956480 - Do you need a break?
- No...

1962402 1965342 Now I do need a
break, by the way...

1984227 1985983 Well, why didn't you
say something before?

1986008 1988863 Well, because I didn't
think you'd give a shit.

1990749 1995020 You've got no fat on you and all
you've had to eat is sugar.

1997281 1999541 Unfortunately, there isn't
a lot we can do about that

1999621 2004713 except pump you full of painkillers and
give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010454 2013455 Actually, I did have a
can of Tango somewhere.

2090865 2093866 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?

2093956 2096217 Let them in, Hannah.
Let them inside.

2129615 2132706 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.

2150361 2153402 Why don't you all
sit down and...

2153492 2156452 Hannah, what've we
got-what've we got to offer?
2156532 2159013 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2170016 2173017 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.

2173107 2175977 Nah, the good ones.
It's a celebration.

2198763 2201854 I know it isn't much
but, well, cheers.

2230642 2236253 Sorry we couldn't spare the water. Same
with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237904 2240164 You'll have to use the bucket.

2246736 2249347 Have to empty it each
morning, you know.

2249427 2253088 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.

2254558 2257689 Yeah, all right. Listen, it's late.
We're gonna turn in.

2271432 2273823 I'll take the living room.
It's fine.

2310533 2314234 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.

2315364 2318185 Probably need us more
than we need them.

2329698 2331557 Well, that's nice, but you
should be more concerned

2331582 2333638 about whether they're
gonna slow you down.

2334279 2338020 - Right, because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342501 2346022 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.

2362066 2365327 You think I don't get it, but...
I do get it.

2367197 2371198 And I know I'd be dead
already if I hadn't met you.

2403427 2405467 We lost water pressure
three weeks ago.

2405597 2407983 For while I thought we'd be okay
with the water from the other flats.

2409778 2412999 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429474 2433735 You can set up a plastic sheet to catch
dew and condensation, trap it somehow...

2433825 2437566 Saw it on TV once, but
I can't make it work.

2453610 2456741 Jim, we're not gonna
be able to stay here.

2465703 2467793 There haven't been any
broadcasts for weeks.

2469534 2474095 Salvation is here.
The answer to infection is here.

2474185 2477186 If you can hear this,
you're not alone.

2477276 2481797 There are others like you...
There are other survivors.

2481877 2484058 We are soldiers
and we are armed.

2487539 2492100 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495711 2499622 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499712 2502103 - Why, 'cause it's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.

2502193 2505103 But this is where it's
telling us to go.

2508844 2513626 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519547 2525629 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525719 2528850 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's okay. It's the truth.

2528940 2531460 I can't leave the block if
it's just the two of us.

2531550 2535501 Something might happen to me. Hannah'd
be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537372 2541683 If it's a recording, for all we know,
the soldiers who made it are dead.

2542837 2545068 And that stuff about the
answer to infection...

2545134 2547097 I mean, there is no
answer to infection!

2547122 2549659 It's already done pretty
much all the damage it can!

2549725 2552556 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing at all!

2552636 2556727 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2561208 2566899 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570380 2575642 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576382 2578472 So we have to try and get there.

2592606 2596347 Just so you know, I don't
take cheques or credit cards.

2625770 2627939 Well, it's the most direct route
to the her side of the river.

2628005 2630247 No, no, no. Then we should
take the indirect route.

2630272 2633291 The one it's in broad daylight
and it's not underground.

2650881 2653362 No. See, see, this is
a really shit idea.

2654232 2657623 You know why? Because it's
really obviously a shit idea.

2657713 2662104 So we're just gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars and...

2662194 2665105 It's really fucking
obviously a shit idea!

2700764 2703155 The world's worst place
to get a flat, huh?

2703245 2706596 Agreed. I think we'd
better do this quick.

2709117 2711247 I've got the wheel.
You're on the jack.

2725861 2729382 Do you hear that? Hey,
hey, do you hear that?

2761390 2765691 Forget the jack, Hannah. There's no time.
Forget the jack. Just lift, everyone.

2775484 2780615 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2791528 2794439 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807832 2810273 - Get in the car!
- Come on!
2834579 2836890 Hey, Frank, Frank, stop the cab.

2886773 2890334 Don't take anything that
needs to be cooked, okay?
2890464 2892294 I think you can eat that raw.

2899946 2904468 If I never see another chocolate
bar again, it'll be too soon.

2920912 2924133 Takes out the fire but
leaves in the warmth.

2979057 2982098 Either we do this now
or we're walking.

3034331 3037022 Like going on holidays
with your fuckin' aunt!

3135138 3137918 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.

3213898 3216899 I wanna, like, taste
the vitamin C.
3217729 3220510 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3263651 3265742 - Come on. Let's eat!
- Let's eat!

3281826 3285527 You were thinking that you'll never hear
another piece of original music ever again.

3285617 3289788 You'll never read a book that
hasn't already been written,

3290828 3294659 or see a film that hasn't
already been shot.
3305662 3307923 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319366 3323887 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325277 3328708 Well, she's got her dad and
he's got his daughter. So...

3331409 3335020 I was wrong when I said staying
alive is as good as it gets.
3338631 3341151 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358936 3362897 It's getting late. I think we'd
better stay here for the night.

3391255 3393905 Selena didn't seem
to have any trouble.

3410730 3414601 Bloody hell. Must've needed a hell
of a prescription for that lot.

3414691 3418992 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.

3421692 3424263 Not only will we be
able to get to sleep

3424343 3428044 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3428174 3430395 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.

3442868 3445569 Come on, Frank. Let
her live a little.

3446659 3450660 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.

3527590 3530371 You're having a bad
dream, that's all.
3585695 3587802 Oh, no. Did I miss breakfast?

3590700 3593881 We'll stop at a
pub on the way. Door!

3618834 3623355 Our location is the
42nd blockade, the M602,
3630837 3633838 The answer to infection is here.

3670187 3673538 The whole of Manchester,
the whole city.
3675409 3677719 No fire crews to put it out.

3808703 3812704 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812794 3815925 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822757 3827578 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943999 3946919 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946999 3949480 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4015497 4018848 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083645 4088516 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088606 4090997 So you can all have a shower.

4091127 4094438 You look like you need one.
Please.

4114393 4119615 It ain't funny. I got loads of
cooking to do, you fucking Doris!

4128397 4131578 Well, she's lost her dad, Jim.
That's how she is.

4143881 4147452 Oh, don't do that, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on...

4151313 4153682 Look, Hannah is what Frank
says she is, okay? She is...

4153707 4156298 ...she is tough and she is strong
and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156404 4160315 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161585 4164016 I want her to be okay.

4165587 4167757 When Hannah had her
dad it was okay.

4167847 4170628 It was okay for them and
it was okay for us.

4210768 4214289 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214379 4220471 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222901 4227073 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to infection.

4231604 4236075 Well, as I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236475 4239386 - Just feel very lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239476 4242607 The fire drove hundreds of
infected out of Manchester.

4258222 4261716 Floodlights which we've
rigged up to a generator.

4265693 4269954 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4270044 4274695 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277956 4282867 Secondary to protection, our real
job is to rebuild. Start again.

4282997 4285388 The belly of the house.
The heart.

4285478 4290739 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4293000 4295130 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4295220 4298391 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4298481 4302522 Don't be fighting. Will you put that back?
Put it back.

4305093 4308094 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4332490 4337581 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4345233 4349274 The idea was to learn
something about infection.

4371980 4375411 He's telling me he'll
never bake bread.

4387024 4392416 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the infected take to starve to death.
4432166 4434647 You'll have to wait and see
4437037 4439608 We hope it's chips, it's chips

4456042 4459393 Tinned ham, tinned peas,
tinned beans and...

4467005 4469436 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.

4469526 4472747 Absolutely. I was going
to propose a toast

4472837 4475967 but this omelette
will do just as well.

4491532 4495443 Jones, did you notice while
cooking that these eggs were off?

4495533 4498923 I thought the salt might
cover the taste, sir.

4505925 4508706 I don't suppose you
can cook, can you?

4509536 4515018 I can't tell you how badly we need someone
with a little flair in the kitchen.

4515108 4519629 What a fucking disappointment. I saw
those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519709 4522980 We'll have eggs again. Once
everything's back to normal.
4523060 4525891 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525981 4529422 He's still waiting for Marks
and Spencer's to reopen.

4529612 4533113 - Listen mate, you don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.

4534543 4537634 If you look at the whole
life of the planet,

4539714 4543855 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.

4544635 4547066 So if the infection
wipes us all out,
4548066 4550377 that is a return to normality.

4554378 4557379 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.

4557459 4560720 Have you met our
New Age sergeant?

4563590 4568812 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why did you
join the army in the first place?

4571592 4575724 This is what I've seen in the
four weeks since infection.

4578514 4581028 Which is much what I saw in the
four weeks before infection

4581053 4583023 and the four weeks before
that and before that...

4583065 4588497 As far back as I care to
remember, people killing people.

4588687 4592338 Which to my mind puts us in a
state of normality right now.

4600650 4603601 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606562 4609822 I don't want to eat. I
want to bury my dad.

4610733 4613823 He's one of the people
you're talking about.
4617955 4620005 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671799 4675410 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!

4692104 4694364 I ain't never seen that
in my fuckin' life!

4717030 4722682 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't gonna
be needing this any more, right?

4722762 4724942 Cos you got me to
protect you now.

4726763 4732034 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733685 4735855 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4742077 4746558 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4754300 4757341 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.

4757431 4760862 Then get to it. Jones,
Bedford, go with him.
4771345 4774045 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776956 4779517 The rest of you, go with him.

4801923 4804169 We're very grateful for your
protection and just having

4804194 4806158 found new people but if
we're gonna stay here...

4806224 4807744 - Who've you killed?
- I haven't killed no one.

4807834 4809905 Since it began who've you killed?
You wouldn't be alive now
4820267 4823398 I killed... I killed a boy.

4835061 4839842 But you had to. Otherwise
he'd have killed you.

4860798 4864589 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865759 4870500 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870590 4873461 What could I say to him?

4873541 4878723 We fight off the infected or we wait until
they starve to death and then what?

4879673 4883504 What do nine men do except
wait to die themselves?

4883594 4886773 I moved us from the blockade,
I set the radio broadcasting

4907290 4909080 - What is it, Jim?
- We have to go.

4909161 4911211 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4917383 4919343 We get in the car and we go!

4920684 4925255 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4925345 4928606 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!

4928686 4931386 I'm not gonna let
you keep them here!
4945300 4947651 I want to give you a chance.
4951482 4953782 But I can't let them go.

4984700 4987621 And Mr. Burns says "We all know
what you think, Smithers."

4987701 4990622 And that was my favourite
joke in The Simpsons.

4990702 4994313 That's what they're doing a few hundred
miles away, across the Channel,

4994403 4998834 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998924 5002185 They're sleeping in their
beds next to their wives.

5002275 5007976 But we're here chained to a fucking
radiator because the OC has gone insane!

5009057 5013108 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.

5021020 5025321 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5025411 5027712 Right now TVs are playing and
planes are flying in the sky

5027792 5031793 and the rest of the world is
continuing as fucking normal.

5036504 5040065 What would you do with a
diseased little island?

5048847 5053198 "There is no infection. It's just
people killing people". He's insane!

5099780 5102861 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103951 5109083 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5109173 5113084 Mitchell, I swear to God it's
gonna end badly for you.
5116955 5119005 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5144012 5147443 Come on then, you
fucking pansies. Do me first.

5147533 5150013 No, Mitch.
Mitch, just use the gat.

5150093 5151933 So you're gonna stick
me, Mitchell, is that it?

5155965 5159016 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5159096 5161016 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5161096 5164577 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173880 5177841 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
What? You wanna shoot me?

5177931 5182102 - You wanna shoot me? I'll fucking kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5183362 5186193 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188673 5191884 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201677 5203547 - Can you see him?
- Through there!

5219031 5222502 He's over the wall.
He's got no vehicle.

5261562 5262781 Now, the first
thing we're going to do

5262806 5264937 is make you look a
little more presentable.

5265003 5268574 It's so happens that the lady of the
house has an extensive wardrobe,

5269254 5271825 which she certainly
has no use for.

5272825 5274646 - You can't do it to Hannah.
- No.

5274736 5278437 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291960 5294741 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294831 5298182 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316917 5321058 You need to leave me
alone with Hannah. Okay?

5322918 5326659 - Listen, all right, the OC... wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326749 5330881 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. Okay?

5354667 5357537 Come on, lads. Let's
leave the room.

5380634 5384595 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, okay?
Come on. Eat these.
5384675 5386805 Are you trying to kill me?
5389246 5391806 I'm making you not care. Okay?

5403770 5406420 Stay here and put
the dresses on.

5412292 5414862 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.

5644922 5647403 It sounded like a
Claymore to me.

5648443 5652404 All right, I'll go and hit the
floods, take a butcher's.
5655145 5657796 keep an eye on him, will ya?

5689014 5691885 What are you gonna do if
they don't come back?

5692625 5695716 Would you be the officer
if Henry was dead?
5695806 5697806 Is that the way it works?

5701367 5705458 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5724373 5727504 We're gonna get out of here. Stay
with that, Hannah. Stay with it.

5752511 5758032 Oi! Where the fuck are you going, oi?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765994 5769385 Well, don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791831 5794782 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5821358 5823664 Defend these stairs
with your fucking life!

6003836 6008237 I haven't got any bullets. I
haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071594 6073431 It's just you and
me now, darlin'.

6073456 6076049 But don't worry, I'm gonna
get you out of here.

6076115 6080146 Then we'll find a nice little fucking
place somewhere. Just you and me.

6080436 6082787 And we'll live happy
ever after, eh?

6173800 6176281 We're gonna be okay.
It's not all fucked.

6176411 6179712 - I've got to explain something...
- Shut up.
